metadata.title: CVE-2016-2420 on Ubuntu 16.04 LTS (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: rootdir/init.rc in Android 4.x before 4.4.4 does not ensure that the/data/tombstones directory exists for the Debuggerd component, which allowsattackers to gain privileges via a crafted application, aka internal bug26403620.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'abandoned').
